languages.text: "Я не виню тебя за излишнюю осторожность, {name}. Тропы, что вьет Ткач Судеб, запутанны и туманны — на них легко оступиться и потерять Истину из виду. Не ошибись, чемпион, и мы останемся союзниками".

"I do not blame you for taking great caution, {name}. The paths devised by the Weaver of Destinies are twisted and obscured — it is easy to stumble and lose sight of the Truth. Do not misstep, champion, and we will remain allies."
languages.original_text: "Я не виню тебя за излишнюю осторожность, {name}. Тропы, что вьет Ткач Судеб, запутанны и туманны — на них легко оступиться и потерять Истину из виду. Не ошибись, чемпион, и мы останемся союзниками".

traits.locale_text: "I do not blame you for taking great caution, {name}. The paths devised by the Weaver of Destinies are twisted and obscured — it is easy to stumble and lose sight of the Truth. Do not misstep, champion, and we will remain allies."

"I do not blame you for taking great caution, {name}. The paths devised by the Weaver of Destinies are twisted and obscured — it is easy to stumble and lose sight of the Truth. Do not misstep, champion, and we will remain allies."

languages.text: « Vous faites bien de vous montrer {mf|prudent|prudente}, {name}. Les voies tracées par le Tisseur de Destins sont sinueuses et voilées, on a vite fait de trébucher et de perdre de vue la vérité. Gardez le cap, {mf|champion|championne}, et nous resterons alliés. »
languages.original_text: "I do not blame you for taking great caution, {name}. The paths devised by the Weaver of Destinies are twisted and obscured — it is easy to stumble and lose sight of the Truth. Do not misstep, champion, and we will remain allies."

traits.locale_text: « Vous faites bien de vous montrer {mf|prudent|prudente}, {name}. Les voies tracées par le Tisseur de Destins sont sinueuses et voilées, on a vite fait de trébucher et de perdre de vue la vérité. Gardez le cap, {mf|champion|championne}, et nous resterons alliés. »

languages.text: «No te culpo por tu cautela, {name}. Las sendas del Tejedor de Destinos son retorcidas y oscuras; es fácil tropezar y perder de vista la Verdad. No des pasos en falso, campe{mf|ón|ona}, y seguiremos siendo aliados».
languages.original_text: "I do not blame you for taking great caution, {name}. The paths devised by the Weaver of Destinies are twisted and obscured — it is easy to stumble and lose sight of the Truth. Do not misstep, champion, and we will remain allies."

traits.locale_text: «No te culpo por tu cautela, {name}. Las sendas del Tejedor de Destinos son retorcidas y oscuras; es fácil tropezar y perder de vista la Verdad. No des pasos en falso, campe{mf|ón|ona}, y seguiremos siendo aliados».

languages.text: 「お前が慎重を期することを責めるつもりはない、{name}。運命の操り手により作り出された道は曲がりくねっており、不明瞭なものだ。たやすくたじろぎ、真理を見失ってしまう。英雄よ、足を踏み外すな」
languages.original_text: "I do not blame you for taking great caution, {name}. The paths devised by the Weaver of Destinies are twisted and obscured — it is easy to stumble and lose sight of the Truth. Do not misstep, champion, and we will remain allies."

traits.locale_text: 「お前が慎重を期することを責めるつもりはない、{name}。運命の操り手により作り出された道は曲がりくねっており、不明瞭なものだ。たやすくたじろぎ、真理を見失ってしまう。英雄よ、足を踏み外すな」

languages.text: “我不会责怪你如此审慎的态度，{name}。命运编织者设计的道路扭曲而模糊，很容易误入歧途，与真理失之交臂。不要走错方向，勇士。只要如此，我们就依然还是盟友。”
languages.original_text: "I do not blame you for taking great caution, {name}. The paths devised by the Weaver of Destinies are twisted and obscured — it is easy to stumble and lose sight of the Truth. Do not misstep, champion, and we will remain allies."

traits.locale_text: “我不会责怪你如此审慎的态度，{name}。命运编织者设计的道路扭曲而模糊，很容易误入歧途，与真理失之交臂。不要走错方向，勇士。只要如此，我们就依然还是盟友。”

languages.text: "Ich kann Euch Eure Vorsicht nicht verdenken, {name}. Die Wege des Webers der Schicksale sind verschlungen und nur schwer zu erkennen ... man gerät leicht ins Straucheln und verliert die Wahrheit aus den Augen. Kommt nicht vom Weg ab, Champion, dann bleiben wir Verbündete."
languages.original_text: "I do not blame you for taking great caution, {name}. The paths devised by the Weaver of Destinies are twisted and obscured — it is easy to stumble and lose sight of the Truth. Do not misstep, champion, and we will remain allies."

traits.locale_text: "Ich kann Euch Eure Vorsicht nicht verdenken, {name}. Die Wege des Webers der Schicksale sind verschlungen und nur schwer zu erkennen ... man gerät leicht ins Straucheln und verliert die Wahrheit aus den Augen. Kommt nicht vom Weg ab, Champion, dann bleiben wir Verbündete."

languages.text: "Dikkatli olduğun için seni suçlamıyorum {name}. Kader Dokuyan tarafından örülen yollar karmaşık ve bulanıktır. Tökezlemek ve Hakikat'i gözden kaybetmek kolaydır. Adımlarını dikkatli at müdafi. Böylece müttefik kalabiliriz."
languages.original_text: "I do not blame you for taking great caution, {name}. The paths devised by the Weaver of Destinies are twisted and obscured — it is easy to stumble and lose sight of the Truth. Do not misstep, champion, and we will remain allies."
